channel.title: Modified sprite editor tool
channel.description:
For anyone who would like to edit sprites, I made a few adjustments to the sprite editor to make it faster to use and less of a hassle.
[url=https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools/archive/master.zip]https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools/archive/master.zip[/url] "Sprite Editor"
Repo: [url=https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools]https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools[/url]
[b]Changes:[/b]
[ul][li]Rearranged buttons for ease of use, set empty defaults for loaded images[/li] [li]Set true for loaded images by default[/li] [li]Removed unneeded features and buttons[/li] [li]Set save sprite button to auto refresh the sprite after offset settings have been filled in to remove need for refresh every time[/li] [li]Set sprite or image to clear after being saved and to clear the old sprite or image that was loaded before a new one is loaded to remove need to click clear button[/li] [li]Set default load and save dialog windows to go to unpack directory automatically to save clicking every time[/li][/ul]

item.title: Modified sprite editor tool
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

For anyone who would like to edit sprites, I made a few adjustments to the sprite editor to make it faster to use and less of a hassle.

https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools/archive/master.zip “Sprite Editor”

Repo: https://github.com/Cleako/WolfZ-Tools

Changes:

[ul][li]Rearranged buttons for ease of use, set empty defaults for loaded images[/li]
[li]Set true for loaded images by default[/li]
[li]Removed unneeded features and buttons[/li]
[li]Set save sprite button to auto refresh the sprite after offset settings have been filled in to remove need for refresh every time[/li]
[li]Set sprite or image to clear after being saved and to clear the old sprite or image that was loaded before a new one is loaded to remove need to click clear button[/li]
[li]Set default load and save dialog windows to go to unpack directory automatically to save clicking every time[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
